ygData.subject: Re: nd second question you speakRE: [eq_wizards] Digest Number 76
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s funny though, I just checked it again and my Conjuration goes up when casting the Halo of Light spell.  Is it possible it checks against both? My
ygData.messageBody:
> No, eye of zom is conjuration that s right but halo of
> light is divination
> (as sense magic). A question for all of you guys :

It's funny though, I just checked it again and my Conjuration goes up
when casting the Halo of Light spell. Is it possible it checks
against both?
My Conjuration was at 0 before I got Halo, because I never used (never
got Eye of Zomm). Since I started using Halo it's gone up a few
points, very slowly, to 7 now. So my guess is it checks against both
Divination and Conjuration. That's the only explanation I can come up
with.

Aznyin
Level 16 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
